head.script: addEventListener("load", function() { setTimeout(hideURLbar, 0); }, false); function hideURLbar(){ window.scrollTo(0,1); }

div.p: This is last slide. Here your text about your project.Here your text about your project. Also attach attractive picture to smartphone screen! Good luck!
I hope my template will be good start for your new projects. In my project you find PSD, all images and Muse project. Flat style and nice colors with parallax effects. Enjoy it.

div.h2: Cool marketing slogan Great call to action with nice and clean button
div.p: A slogan is a memorable motto or phrase used in a political, commercial, religious, and other context as a repetitive expression of an idea or purpose.
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec porttitorcongue dui porttitor leoadipiscing consequat accumsan."
"Nunc ullamcorper consequat blandit. Ut nibh neque, Donec congue dui porttitor leo varius vitae mollis vel, consectetur et eros".
"Nunc ullamcorper consequat blandit. Donec congue dui porttitor leo Ut nibh neque, varius vitae mollis vel, consectetur et eros."

Just some information about your demo app or something like that. Maybe some info about components which includes in trial (demo) application. I hope you will like my landing page template. I made it for you. Enjoy!
